title: New Communications Book by Executive Coach Maria Keckler Provides a Blueprint for Communication Success
text:
Morgan James Publishing
NEW YORK , Oct. 19, Morgan James' new release, Bridge Builders: How Superb Communicators Get What They Want in Business and in Life by Maria Keckler , teaches readers how to connect and persuade through the power of story and strong communication.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151016/277796
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151016/277797
"All good leaders share one crucial trait-they are superb communicators. They inspire a shared vision and reach team goals because they communicate them effectively. Bridge Builders: How Superb Communicators Get What They Want in Business and in Life models and teaches how the best communicators craft compelling messages that inspire their audiences," said Maria Keckler , president and founder of Superb Communication ; a San Diego based firm specializing in strategic communication solutions, executive coaching, and training.
"Bridge-building communication is the defining line between success and failure. Its foundation consists of empathy, authenticy, and respect: considering my audience, what they care about, and how I can best reach them. Bridge Builders offers actionable tips and teaches the principles and practices that will help communicators stand out from the crowd," she said.
Bridge Builders is written as an inspirational and thought-provoking fable that illustrates the power of human connection, told from the perspective of the fictitious Daniel Reed . His journey of self-discovery and budding communication skills inspire readers to become the bridge builders they have always been capable of being.
Bridge Builders: How Superb Communicators Get What They Want in Business and in Life provides a simple blueprint for enriching the quality of personal and business relationships through successful channels of communication. Higher business revenues, faster conflict resolution, and greater relational satisfaction all lie at the other end of the communication bridge. Learn how to mobilize positive change in your life and business, and become a Bridge Builder today!
If you would like more information about this topic, or to schedule an interview with Maria Keckler , please call Nickcole Watkins at 516.900.5674.
About the Author:
Maria Keckler is president and founder of Superb Communication ; a San Diego based firm specializing in strategic communication solutions, executive coaching, and training. Maria's experience spans almost 20 years, developing and coaching global leaders across the United States , Mexico , and Eastern Europe . She has worked with executives, engineers, scientists, educators, and leaders in healthcare, pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, communication, technology, finance, and education. Maria's articles have been featured in leadership and communication journals and publications. She's a regular radio guest.
More About This Title:
Bridge Builders: How Superb Communicators Get What They Want in Business and in Life by Maria Keckler will be released by Morgan James Publishing on October 13, 2015 . Bridge Builders- ISBN 978-1630475390-has 200 pages and is being sold as a trade paperback for $17.95 .
